title: Data-Driven Project-Based Learning for Aluminum Alloy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Learners, role-playing as office/administrative professionals, undertake an aluminum alloy design project to resolve real-world industry strength-ductility trade-off challenges.

learning_goals: Propose an aluminum alloy composition that overcomes the strength-ductility trade-off using machine learning and reverse engineering methodologies
Explain alloy design principles by analyzing the correlation between microstructure and mechanical properties
Develop an alloy design prototype considering actual manufacturing process conditions (mass production scale) through team-based projects
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
